overview: The super-hung hunks that make up the cast seem casual about their work renovating the house but serious about the sex that they have along the way. Jet Set Exclusives Nickolay Petrov and Sebastian Young as hot construction workers, lead off the cast of nine in a series of four sizzling sexual encounters. These men are not only (perhaps) building code violators but about to be sexually “cheating moral code” ones as well.
title: Code Violators
